thread.section_title: Hotel de Bellevue Paris Gare du Nord - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice Hotel, Awful Location
thread.title_full: Nice Hotel, Awful Location - Review of Hotel de Bellevue Paris Gare du Nord, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Zoe D
title: Nice Hotel, Awful Location
text: Room was lovely, clean and comfy. Breakfast was somewhat lacking, even for a continental breakfast. Location... shocking! I felt like I was in downtown Beirut, not Paris! As a single woman I didn't feel safe to walk around in the evening so I was confined to the hotel from sun down. If you're looking to explore the city and enjoy the Parisian experience, it would be worth the little extra money for a more central area with a little less hostile environment.
